brainly_data.question:
Solve the problem by applying the fundamental counting principle. an apartment complex offers apartments with four different​ options, designated by a through
d. aequalsnumber of bedrooms​ (one through​ four) bequalsnumber of bathrooms​ (one through​ three) cequalsfloor ​(first through​ fifth) dequalsoutdoor additions​ (balcony or no​ balcony) how many apartment options are​ available?
brainly_data.subject: Mathematics
